testcase.name: Verify Login for valid inputs
testcase.system-out: Given user is on home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Signin link.............................................passed Then check title............................................................passed When user enters username and password clicks on Submit.....................passed Then Check Login Successful.................................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Login for invalid inputs
